department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: A La Francaise: French Feminisms Today
course.description: Close readings of postwar French fiction and theory with emphasis on what is called "the feminine" in key psychoanalytic, philosophical, and literary writings of the French poststructuralist tradition. In particular, we will focus on fifty years of dialogue between postwar theory in France and feminist practice in the United States. Writers considered include Cixous, Duras, Hyvrard, Irigaray, Kristeva, and Wittig as well as Deleuze, Derrida, and Lacan.
